nl.tno.sensorstorm.api.processing

Interface Operation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ParticleBatchOperation, SingleParticleOperation

    public interface Operation
extends Serializable
    An operation performs the processing of particles in a fieldGroupValue. This is the abstract interface or the SingleParticleOperation and the ParticleBatchOperation The SensorStormBolt manages the operations, each fieldGroupValue will have its own operation instance. An operation is created at soon as the SensorStormBolt gets a particle with an unknown fieldGroupValue.

    An Operation must have an OperationDeclaration annotation, otherwise it will be rejected by the SensorStormBolt.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init(String fieldGrouperValue, long startTimeStamp, Map stormNativeConfig, nl.tno.storm.configuration.api.ExternalStormConfiguration zookeeperStormConfiguration)
      Initialize this operation.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(String fieldGrouperValue,
        long startTimeStamp,
        Map stormNativeConfig,
        nl.tno.storm.configuration.api.ExternalStormConfiguration zookeeperStormConfiguration)
          throws OperationException
        Initialize this operation.
        Parameters:
        fieldGrouperValue - Value for the grouping field if any, otherwise null
        startTimeStamp - The time of the first particle this operation will get. Or -1 if a single operation is created for all particles (in the SensorStormBolt constructor the fieldgrouperid == null)
        stormNativeConfig - A reference to the storm config object
        zookeeperStormConfiguration - A reference to the ExternalStormConfiguration
        Throws:
        OperationException - If an error occurs in the Operation
